fields.title: Bundjalung Web Application
fields.short_description: Django-based web application for Indigenous language preservation with multimedia content and user authentication.
fields.detailed_description: A comprehensive web application built with Django to preserve and share Indigenous language content. Features include audio archives, transcript editing, and role-based authentication.
fields.problem_statement: The existing Web2py application needed modernization to Django framework while preserving valuable language data and audio archives.
fields.solution_approach: Migrated legacy Web2py application to Django, implemented modern authentication systems, built transcript editors with HTML5 audio integration, and created responsive templates.
fields.outcome_results: Successfully migrated all language data, implemented role-based authentication, created intuitive transcript editor, and developed wiki-style CMS with version control.

fields.title: Project MyWeb
fields.short_description: Developing my own Django-based website allows me to create a fully customizable, dynamic web application with a powerful backend, database integration, and user-friendly frontend.
